kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Get Value From Json
kw.doc: Get Value From JSON using JSONPath

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: This test case verifies that the response code of the GET Request should be 200, the response body contains the 'title' key with value as 'London', and the response body contains the key 'location_type'.
test.status: SSLError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='www.metaweather.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /api/location/search/?query=london (Caused by SSLError(SSLEOFError(8, '[SSL: UNEXPECTED_EOF_WHILE_READING] EOF occurred in violation of protocol (_ssl.c:1020)')))

test.name: Do a POST Request and validate the response code, response body, and response headers

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: &{body} = { title=foo | body=bar | userId=9000 }
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: &{header} = { Cache-Control=no-cache }
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts path_url=/posts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Cache-Control': 'no-cache', 'Content-Length': '30', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=title=foo&body=bar&userId=9000
${response} = <Response [201]>
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Get Value From Json
kw.doc: Get Value From JSON using JSONPath

kw.name: Get From List
kw.msg: ${idFromList} = 101
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.msg: ${idFromListAsString} = 101
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.msg: ${getHeaderValue} = application/json; charset=utf-8
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: This test case verifies that the response code of the POST Request should be 201, the response body contains the 'id' key with value '101', and the response header 'Content-Type' has the value 'application/json; charset=utf-8'.

test.name: Verify Successful creation of Table

Connect To Database

test.name: Verify Successful Login to OrangeHRM

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: Element 'id:txtUsername' not visible after 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies that user is able to successfully Login to OrangeHRM

test.name: Verify Successful Login to the-internet.herokuapp

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'tomsmith' into text field 'id:username'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id:password'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css:button[type="submit"]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'css:[href="/logout"]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies that user is able to successfully Login to the-internet.herokuapp
